Bash(cmd /c "set PGPASSWORD=y9eshszbrr&& psql -U postgres -d campus_placement_portal -c ""SELECT c.id, c.college_name, COUNT\(DISTINCT s.branch\) as branch_count, COUNT\(s.id\) as student_count FROM colleges c LEFT JOIN students s ON c.id = s.college_id AND s.registration_status = ''approved'' AND s.is_blacklisted = FALSE GROUP BY c.id, c.college_name ORDER BY student_count DESC LIMIT 5;""")
